body:
@crawshaw Yes, a tool like that would be fantastic. [I've wanted such a tool](https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/gwz2QIqyWzQ/fP6gsKAzPq4J) for a while now. I started to build one but soon realized the learning curve and level of effort was too great for my available spare time.

Back to the proposal at hand. @davecheney If you add support for this to `gb vendor` I am willing to give it a test drive. I have several versioned projects (internal) that depend on well versioned repositories (both external and internal) that I can try out various scenarios with.
